items.item: With Batman and Star Wars featuring in a range of exciting PlayStation Network content, how can you afford to miss outA

item.title: Multiplayer modes and maps move to Mars

items.item: Explosive new Red Faction® Guerrilla™ multiplayer modes and maps available at PlayStation®Store from September 18.

item.title: Take flight in this developer diary

items.item: Take a look behind the scenes of IL-2 Sturmovik: Birds of Prey, one of this year's most anticipated aerial combat games for PlayStation®3 and PSP®.
Downloadable content for Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen coming to PlayStation Store.
WWE SmackDown vs. Raw 2010 enters the virtual ring with the announcement of key features and franchise updates.

item.title: Crash Commando's price gets shot in half

items.item: PlayStation Network's smash hit shoot 'em up, Crash Commando, has been given a price cut for a limited time only - fancy a shotA
Konami announces all-new psychological profiling, the Belmont Clan and more at gamescom, Europe's leading trade fair in Cologne, Germany.
Bizarre Creations' new powered-up racer Blur™ locks in New Zealand launch date of November 4, 2009.
PlayStation Network gets an extra dose of content with all the latest trailers from gamescom 2009 joining a host of demos, packs and more.
